sentences.en: A nod's as good as a wink , she was sacked for incompetence.
sentences.cn: 不用多说, 她因不称职而被解雇.

sentences.en: A nod's as good as a wink , their political rights must be safeguarded.
sentences.cn: 不用多说, 他们的政治权益必须得到保证.

sentences.en: A wink is as good as a nod to a blind horse.
sentences.cn: 对瞎马点头眨眼都是一样.

sentences.en: And Evremonde will be despatched in a wink, and she not here!
sentences.cn: 埃佛瑞蒙德一转眼工夫就要报销了, 可她不在这儿!

sentences.en: He gave me a friendly wink.
sentences.cn: 他向我递了个友好的眼色.

sentences.en: He tipped me the wink not to buy at that price.
sentences.cn: 他眨眼暗示我按那个价格就不要买.

sentences.en: He winked an eye at his companion.
His left eye moved with just the semblance of a wink.
sentences.cn: "他的左眼牵动了一下,算是眨眼了.

sentences.en: I didn't get a wink of sleep on the aeroplane.
sentences.cn: 我在飞机上没合一下眼。

sentences.en: It was so dark that we could n't see a wink.
sentences.cn: 天色那么黑以致我一点也看不见.

sentences.en: The article then listed a series of nudge-nudge, wink-wink rumors that have appeared in newspapers over the last two years.
sentences.cn: 文章接下来列举了过去两年间报纸上出现过的一连串性丑闻传言。

sentences.en: The Mouse looked at her rather inquisitively, and seemed to her to wink with one of its little eyes, but It'said nothing.
sentences.cn: 这老鼠狐疑地看着她, 好像还把一只小眼睛向她眨了眨, 但没说话.

sentences.en: We could not sleep a wink last night because of noise.
sentences.cn: 因为太吵,昨晚我们一点儿也没睡.

sentences.en: We saw the wink at the ships bow.
sentences.cn: 我们看到船首有灯光闪烁.

sentences.en: winked at corruption in the ministry.
sentences.cn: 对于部里的渎职现象视而不见

sentences.en: With that he gave Hung - chien and Hsin - mei a mischievous wink.
sentences.cn: 说时,对鸿 渐 和 辛楣 顽皮地眨眼.

words.tran_cn: 使眼色的人；马的眼罩；睫毛；[车辆] 汽车用闪光灯

phrases.phrase: in the wink of an eye (或 in a wink)
not sleep (或 get) a wink (或 not get a wink of slee

phrases.tran_cn: [口语]睡一会儿，打个盹儿[用于否定句、条件句或疑问句]

trans.tran_en: a quick action of opening and closing one eye, usually as a signal to someone else
to close and open one eye quickly to communicate something or show that something is a secret or joke
to close and open one eye quickly to communicate something or show that something is a secret or joke
